# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  RLC_ladder100.cir RLC_ladder100_mor.cir RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.sh RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.tags RLC_ladder100_mor_sparsify.cir RLC_ladder_top30.cir exclude tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/SPARSIFY/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.sh COMMAND bash RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} RLC_ladder100_mor.cir ${OutputDataDir}/ROM/SPARSIFY/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/SPARSIFY/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/SPARSIFY/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;rom;resistor;capacitor;inductor;ac")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/SPARSIFY/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.sh COMMAND bash RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} RLC_ladder100_mor.cir ${OutputDataDir}/ROM/SPARSIFY/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/SPARSIFY/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/SPARSIFY/RLC_ladder100_mor.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;rom;resistor;capacitor;inductor;ac")
endif()
